mapper.update: UPDATE /*+ update_TB_SY_D_USR_MYMNU */ TB_SY_D_USR_MYMNU SET CORP_C = #{CORP_C} /* 회사코드 */ , USR_ID = #{USR_ID} /* 사용자아이디 */ , MENU_ID = #{MENU_ID} /* 메뉴아이디 */ , LSCHG_DTM = GETDATE() /* 최종변경일시 */ , LSCHG_ID = #{GUSRID} /* 최종변경자ID */ WHERE 1=1 AND CORP_C = #{CORP_C} AND MENU_ID = #{MENU_ID} AND USR_ID = #{USR_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT /*+ select_TB_SY_D_USR_MYMNU */ A.CORP_C /* 회사코드 */ , A.USR_ID /* 사용자아이디 */ , A.MENU_ID /* 메뉴아이디 */ , CONVERT(CHAR(23), A.FSRG_DTM, 20) AS FSRG_DTM /* 최초등록일시 */ , A.FSRG_ID /* 최초등록자ID */ , CONVERT(CHAR(23), A.LSCHG_DTM, 20) AS LSCHG_DTM /* 최종변경일시 */ , A.LSCHG_ID /* 최종변경자ID */ FROM TB_SY_D_USR_MYMNU A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CORP_C = #{CORP_C} AND A.MENU_ID = #{MENU_ID} AND A.USR_ID = #{USR_ID}
